config_name: Categorical Filter Daily - caffeine source swap

configuration_json.formula: if (unhealthy_caffeine_sources_daily <= threshold) then success_value else failure_value

schema.description: SC-CATEGORICAL-FILTER-DAILY: Success requires swapping at least one unhealthy caffeine source for coffee/tea daily

metadata.recommendation_text: Swap one daily energy drink, pre-workout, or high-caffeine soda for coffee or tea

analysis.reasoning: SC-CATEGORICAL-FILTER-DAILY: Daily evaluation of caffeine source categories with swap requirement
